body: This pull request adds a `+blopex` variant to SLEPc. Ordinarily, I would write a separate package for BLOPEX, but looking at the SLEPc BLOPEX repo https://bitbucket.org/joseroman/blopex, it appears that "standalone BLOPEX" is pretty sparsely documented, and even the project README recommends using it from either hypre or SLEPc, so it doesn't seem worth writing a separate `blopex` spack package.
title: slepc: add blopex variant
